page.title: 18Daily Life
page.content: Steven. At 8.00 AM I got up and went to work helping Dad. I unloaded a truck then loaded it again. At 10 AM one of the drivers went to Holmes Chapel for some pies. At 10.30 AM I went home, got changed and went to Knutsford Swimming Club. At 11.30 AM I got out of the water and met Damian. We had a talk and then I went home. When I got home I had some dinner and played on my bike. At 1.00 PM Peter and I decided to go and see Chitty Chitty Bang Bang at Arthur Burgess's Garage and then we went to Jodrell Bank. After that we went to a barbecue in Chelford and we cycled home at 8 PM. I stayed out until 9 PM and then went in. I had a play fight with my Dad and went to bed at 11 PM.
